Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] THe Ovilus



Elabeth,
 
I have A LOT OF TOYS at=
 this time.  Which I am sure a lot of other
paranormal investigators have a=
s well.  I am not selling this unit
because it does not work but because it=
 does work and I have lots of
other toys and boxes that work as well.  I al=
so have a few other boxes
that I will be selling and maybe listing on Ebay =
as well.  And I just
recently went on an investigation at Eastern State Pen=
n and I had so
much equipment there and not enough hands or body to carry i=
t, LOL.  So
I do not want to put myself in that position oagain.
 
Jeff
 
I=
n a message dated 8/12/2008 11:43:19 A.M. Central Standard Time,
elabeth@gm=
ail.com writes:

	

	I'll ask some local ghost hunters I know if they'd be =
interested
and
	pass along your email addy. If you get great responses then=
 why
sell
	it? I know they're gonna ask. haha I'd keep the toys that work
w=
ell.
	I'm sure the editing did cut out some waiting around etc., and I
	hav=
en't read Ryan's blog about the episode yet. He will usually
say
	something=
 about it there if the editing is done to make
something seem
	more than wh=
at it was and I've seen him express concern about
	production things there =
before, so I think he'll mention it if
the
	footage was heavily edited.
	
	=
~Elabeth
	
	On Tue, Aug 12, 2008 at 11:29 AM, <Marlboro63@...
<mailto:M=
arlboro63%40aol.com> > wrote:

h of what the Ovilus 1 said probably
ended up on the

 But it does work. I get great responses
from mine.

des on it work very well. But if you know
anyone who

t me know. I was informed I have to sell
some of my toys
	> to afford to bu=
y new toys...LOLOL I would sell it for $165.00
and it is in

ndition and only used a few times.

	> Jeff

/2008 11:24:20 A.M. Central Standard
Time,

beth%40gmail.com>  writes:

ted the word "worry"
when

 priest.

readings?=
 If I

play w=
ith.
	> ~Elabeth

<debbie.fransen@... <mailto:debbie.fransen%40delta.com>

ese guys
